WELCOME_INTRO: What is your forecast for today?
LOGIN_NICKNAME_ERROR: The user that you have entered is not registered in the system. Please, change the username and try to log in again.
LOGIN_PASSWORD_ERROR: The credentials entered do not match. Please correct and enter the password and try to log in again.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: A temporary password has been sent to your email
FORGOT_PASSWORD_ERROR: There is no  user associated in the syste with that email
ACCEPT_CONDITIONS: I accept the terms and conditions
USERNAME_MAXLENGTH_ERROR: The username must have a maximum of 15 characters.
PASSWORD_MINLENGTH_ERROR: Password must be at least 5 characters long.
PASSWORD_PATTERN_ERROR: Your password must contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase, and one number. No special characters are allowed: #$%&
TERMS_PATTERN_ERROR: You must accept terms and conditions.
SIGNUP_NICKNAME_ERROR: This nickname is already used, please enter another nickname.
SIGNUP_EMAIL_ERROR: This email is already used, please enter another email.
HOME_SUBTITLE: News and updates from Kiniela Sports
GAME_SAVE_SUBTITLE: You can create games according to your rules
GAME_LIST_SUBTITLE: List of your registered games from where you can enter your forecasts
GAME_AVAILABLE_LIST_SUBTITLE: Find available games from where you can sign up
BET_MATCH_LIST_SUBTITLE: List of subscribed events from where you can enter your forecasts
CREDIT_LIST_SUBTITLE: Here you can see your account and manage credit operations
CONTACT_US_SUBTITLE: Here you can send us any questions, comments or suggestions about the app
FLAG_NOTIFICATION: Do you want to receive notifications by email?
GAME_PENDING_EVENT_COUNT: Number of pending matchs to bet
GAME_SAVE_ERROR: You don't have enough credits to register for this game.
ACCEPT_RULES: I have read and accept the rules
COPY_TO_ALL: Copy forecast of the first match to others
BET_SAVE_ERROR: This forecast can not be updated, since the event has already started according to the current date and time defined
BET_SAVE_ERROR2: You have exceeded the maximum number of wildcards for this game
CREDITS_BUY_INFO: From this screen, you can indicate the number of credits you want to buy. This purchase will be notified to the administrator of Kiniela Sports, who will contact you via email to confirm the transaction and indicate the following steps. Once your credits are approved, these will be transferred to your account so you can sign up for any game that requires registration fees from the app.
CREDITS_COLLECT_INFO: To collect credits you must have a minimum of 1,000 credits so that we can make the transfer to your bank account. This purchase will be notified to the administrator of Kiniela Sports, who will contact you via email to confirm the transaction and indicate the next steps to follow. Once the transaction is approved, the credits requested will be transferred to your bank account.
CREDIT_ADD_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Do you want to buy credits?
CREDIT_ADD_ERROR: You can not buy more than the maximum allowed in the application. Enter an amount to buy no greater than 5000.
CREDIT_ADD_ERROR2: There is a purchase transaction pending approval. Wait for it to be processed, to proceed with a new purchase.
CREDIT_COLLECT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Do you want to collect credits?
CREDIT_COLLECT_ERROR: You don't have the minimum credits to carry out the collection transaction. You must have at least 1000 credits to make a transaction of collect type.
CREDIT_COLLECT_ERROR2: You are wanting to collect more credits than you currently have. Please enter a lower amount.
CREDIT_COLLECT_ERROR3: The action to collect credits is not equal to type of transaction with code 1.
FOLLOW_FRIEND_ERROR: Select another user to follow other than yourself.
FOLLOW_FRIEND_ERROR2: You have already added this user as a friend.
INVITE_FRIEND_ERROR: This user is already enrolled in this game.
INVITE_FRIEND_ERROR2: You can not invite yourself to a game.
INVITE_FRIEND_ERROR3: This user has already been invited.
INVITE_FRIEND_ALERT_SUBTITLE: To be able to invite a friend you must first sign up for a game
GAME_NO_DATA_FOUND: You don't have games registered. Please create a game or access the available games that are in the system
AVAILABLE_GAME_NO_DATA_FOUND: At the moment there are no available games. It's your chance to be the first to create one!
FRIEND_NO_DATA_FOUND: You are not following any friends. Please, go access any game, so you can follow people and see their predictions.
